'''Kahn''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A young woman lingers near the stage with a mug of ale clutched tight in her hands. Though she shows no interest in the dancers, the bags beneath her eyes speak to many long nights spent drinking in the tavern.
She looks lazily about the room until her gaze alights on you with interest.}}

Kahn is currently looking for [Oswald](/oswald/), an elf who borrowed five thousand coppers from her and refused to pay it back. Understandably, she's annoyed about it. If he wasn't an old family friend - for four generations no less, due to him being an elf - and hadn't convinced her he was on the verge of creating a device that could use luminous adra to extend one's lifespan, she'd never have given him the money.

Kahn's the descendant of Admet Hadret and a minor Dyrwoodan noble. She despises the connection, as whenever someone realizes it, she suddenly becomes a Lady and people start doting on her. Understandably, she can't stand it.

## =Quests

=
* [Lost Dues in Good Faith](/lostDuesInGoodFaith/): She asks you for help finding [Oswald](/oswald/).
